data.title: Technical University of Denmark
data.meta_description: DTU is recognized internationally as a leading university in the areas of the technical and the natural sciences, renowned for our business-oriented approach, our focus on sustainability, and our amazing study environment.
data.text:
Ranked 2 in the world

In 2020, DTU achieved the best ranking position ever when World University Research Rankings placed DTU as the second best university in the world and number one in Europe.

Find DTUâ€™s current ranking.

Green transportation

The transportation sector is emitting more and more CO2 from cars, trucks, airplanes and shipping.

On the green transportation topic page, you can learn more about how DTU contributes to bring more of the known solutions and technologies into play.

Read about green transportation

Ready for a challenging job in an international atmosphere?

As an employee at DTU, you become part of a large company with an international atmosphere and many opportunities to develop.

Learn more about working at DTU.

Moving to Denmark?

Corporate HR is on hand to help with the many practical aspects of the relocation process. You and your family will be put in touch with a HR-consultant, who will be able to offer guidance and answers to your questions.

Learn more in our welcome guide.
